title: Venus Transit in the 4th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the fourth house enhances comfort, emotional harmony, and attachment to home and inner peace. This phase favors beautifying living spaces, nurturing family bonds, and restoring emotional balance. Domestic happiness and a sense of security increase. While pleasure and ease grow, overindulgence in comfort or emotional dependency can slow progress if moderation is not maintained.

sections.heading: Career
points: Support for work-from-home or flexible roles
Creative planning thrives in calm environments

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Family bonds feel warmer and supportive
Romance finds expression in care and presence

sections.heading: Finance
points: Spending on home, d√©cor, or vehicles increases

sections.heading: Mental / Inner State
points: Mind seeks calm and emotional safety

closing: This transit deepens comfort and emotional ease at home. Moderation ensures peace supports steady progress.
